title: Gold
lyrics:
[Intro Chorus: The-Dream]
Gold all on my body
Got that rosé all in my body
And them strobes all on your body
And your soul all on my body
I need you-ooh-ooh
Told her I need you, baby
[Verse 1: Pusha T & 
The-Dream
]
Yeah, gold all on my body
New beginner, kitchen full of blenders 
(Yeah)
One agenda 
(Hello?)
, drop it in a ninja 
(You)
Hold the limos, might just pay your renter 
(You-ooh-ooh, ay)
No pretender, shoutout to the cinder 
(Yeah)
Real life, real life, drop tops in December
Coldest winters ever, we gon' win forever
Cuatrocientos ochenta y ocho, we gon' spin together
Black and yellow, Wiz Khalifa petals, sit on blended leather
What more can I tell you? The kilo is 26
You text me - I text back, they come in with 20 bricks
[Bridge: Pusha T]
The plug is the outlet, and I am not outch'yet
These drug dealers singalongs, now whatchu know 'bout that?
[Chorus: The-Dream]
Gold all on my body
Got that rosé all in my body
And them strobes all on your body
And your soul all on my body
I need you-ooh-ooh
Told her I need you, baby
Yeah, gold all on my body
Girl, them diamonds all on my body
Girl, you shining all on my body
Girl, keep grinding all on my body
I need you-ooh-ooh, babe
Honey, I need you-ooh-ooh, babe

[Verse 2: Pusha T & 
The-Dream
]
Yeah, gold all on my body
We not worried 'bout no other niggas, we them other niggas 
(Babe)
You bust down a Rollie, I bust down a brick, then I flood it, nigga 
(You)
I am not to be compared to you rappers, Eazy-Duz-It, nigga 
(You-ooh-ooh)
I am more Eazy, you tryin' your best to become me, nigga 
(Yeah)
She like them bottles with bubbles in it
Buy her Loewe and other linen
Why would I wait when there's other women?
Why would I hate? We in love with winnin', ooh! 
(You)
Buy her bundles, fly her out, bring her friend, I try her out
Ain't no worries findin' out, the details is ironed out 
(Gold)
Easily they plays along 
(Ro-)
, hopin' that I play a song 
(Gold)
Love to fuck to trap music
Dope money just came along, ooh
[Bridge: Pusha T]
The plug is the outlet, and I am not outch'yet
These drug dealers singalongs, now whatchu know 'bout that?
[Chorus: The-Dream]
Gold all on my body
Got that rosé all in my body
And them strobes all on your body
And your soul all on my body
I need you-ooh-ooh
Told her I need you, baby
Yeah, gold all on my body
Girl, them diamonds all on my body
Girl, you shining all on my body
Girl, keep grinding all on my body
I need you-ooh-ooh, babe
Honey, I need you-ooh-ooh, babe
Yeah
